projects.name: Material Math

projects.name: Grey Software Website
projects.desc: Grey Software is creating the open source ecosystem of the future where software maintainers mentor students and build free software together!

projects.name: Open Source
projects.desc: The Open Source discord is a project of the Futurist Foundation. Open source promotes wide access and global security, by allowing knowledge to remain free and open for ALL.

projects.name: Desgin For Good
projects.desc: We believe that design is one of the most important aspects of our every day life. It effects people more than they know. Good design should be a requirement. Here we focus on helping projects within the non profit, redesigning, and improving bad designs.

projects.name: Skill Sharing
projects.desc: Sometimes its hard to learn new things by yourself. Futurist Foundation has started a Skill Sharing server for members to take courses together, study, ask/answer questions and just learn new things.
